name: Kc Comer
text: So we ordered the dinner box and an extra order of wings the food got here early but one of the pizzas and breadsticks was wrong so I called the store back and KYLE who is a manager at this location and was also our delivery driver â€¦More

name: flyingbear Hong
text: It's  tasty

name: Charmaine W
text: The delivery was SO FAST I WAS IN SHOCK! The pizza was fantastic and my delivery driver was super nice with the whole non contact delivery because of Covid-19. I will be ordering again

name: Jamie Custer
text: Pizza was hot and amazing. The service was also fast and polite. Made the mistake of ordering Dominos once a month ago. Completly opposite experience. Customer service was horrible and pizza was cold and awful.

name: Julie Overfelt
text: I wish I didnâ€™t have to give them 1 star. I decided to try Pizza Hut because I had a coupon in the Dixie Direct. The coupon was a Large One topping pizza for $5. I went to pay for it with my Dixie Direct Card and she said $6.35. WTH? She â€¦More

name: Sarah Fiske
text: Answer your phone! We call every week to try and order pizza and literally the phone just rings and rings. I dont know how you expect business without a functioning phone line. We wish we could enjoy your food but we have to always go elsewhere because we always have this problem with you guys. Thanks.

name: UWU UWU
text: Been on the phone for over 30 minutes for an update and Iâ€™ve been waiting over 2 hours for my order. Safe to say that I wonâ€™t be ordering from Pizza Hut again

name: Alexis Williams
text: I would give this location a negative report if I could. I donâ€™t even know where to start. Expected a delivery, took forever, called them and the manager handed the phone to the driver which was extremely rude, we offered to pick up our â€¦More

name: William Fontenot
text: Made a 70 dollar order. Store didn't deliver and didn't botger to call us to let us know it wasn't going to be delivered.

name: Ariana Gleaton
text: My order was over 15 minutes late. When I called the store to find my order, they put me on hold and ignored me for an additional 15 minutes on the phone. Food was all overcooked and slightly burnt. Not impressed.

name: Drayk Hendry
text: Usually good food, but always very slow. Shorted me six wings this time and I had to sit on hold for ten minutes just to tell them. Currently waiting for my other 6. Come on Pizza Hut I thought you were better than that

name: Jeremy Bray
text: Great pizza place, always great for a quick bite. They make the best thin pizza in town. Store is always clean with insanely friendly staff. Was helped by Shailey and Christine. They seriously make the best pies. I always try and come in â€¦More

name: Doug Groves
text: I haven't had a personal pan pizza hut and years! It was cooked crispy just like I asked when ordering online. It was ready on time and the girl up front was really nice when ringing me up! I will definatly be coming back! Ps the pizza is great!

name: Brittany Riddle
text: I ordered online for my grandfather a plain cheese pizza and they delivered a completely wrong order. It was unfortunate because he couldn't eat any of it.

name: Michael Milton
text: I've been on hold for over 15 minutes... No representative has come on the line to let me know they are busy and they'll be with me in a moment. This is the worst service I have had in a while.

name: Michael
text: Great service, friendly staff.  Pizza was hot and delicious!

name: Kent Hunt
text: This pizza is really good. The location is close to my home, so that is nice. I would recommend them.

name: Bc Ch
text: I feel the employee is not focusing on the pizza when it baking. My pizzas is half burn, out of my visits this happen 3 out of 4 time. I

name: Nancy Carlton
text: Had to wait longer that expected but manager gave me an extra bonus which was very good business practiceðŸ˜Š

name: Matthew Alldredge
text: Love getting pizza from here! The staff is friendly and work to make the food the best they can. I normally do get my food delivery though. So, I'm normally talking to the drivers. They come pretty quick and are nice as well. The few times I actually go into the store same way. Nice workers, quick service, and a nice store.

name: Kelly Spoonts
text: Good fast service and pizza was good

name: Marie 1011
text: Their service is really bad!!! Our pizza came over an hour later. My kids stayed up late for dinner on a school night. I'm highly disappointed. I've never experienced any troubles with a pizza hut before.

name: Nick Jones
text: Pizza hut is my favorite place to go for fun and pizza I had a friend that worked here and he would make the best pizzas on the planet thank you so much have a wonderful day and a good night thank you Pizza hut

name: mikl paul
text: Only 2/3rds of our food came. Was on hold for 30 minutes before reaching someone. But 30 minutes since then and still no food.

name: Sabastian Stratman
text: The owner is a solid guy from Flint, MI, i would work for him again i just had a better opportunity. Loved the pizza and would recommend.

name: Twilla Williamson
text: Meat Pzone was great shared with my friend was plenty.

name: Jordyn Murillo
text: They Recently not sure how long ago, changed their cheese. It is no longer melty and good like it used to be. The cheese now feels like a sauce with Parmesan grains in it. Most disgusting pizza I've had in a long time. I am normally a pizza hut fan because of my husband. But with this recent change we are switching to Dominos.

name: Alyssa Bradley
text: This place is ridiculous to order from. I got the call center several times and waited on hold for 15 minutes just to order. I was waiting for them to transfer me to the store. I decided to just go in and order. When I was ordering the â€¦More

name: Sara Sullivan
text: The people are nice, they fix any problems that are made. VERY accommodating. Good food, they must have a great cook!

name: E Christoff
text: Ordered two, two topping pizzas, they got one wrong and one right. Paid for 6 garlic dipping sauces, got ranch. I HATE RANCH. They send the driver back, I received the correct pizza, but got more ranch yet again â€¦More

name: Eddie Parker
text: Under new management,food was great and staff was very friendly

name: Jen Tobbler
text: I have ordered pizza from here twice and will not be back. The staff were not nice either time and the second time our pizza was served cold. When I tried to talk to them about it, they blew me off. No more Pizza Hut for us!

text: Very good pizza wish I had one in hurricane utah so I wouldn't have to drive to St George

text: Our pizza was burnt and super dry, this was our last time going to this location, we thought we would give them one more shot after they messed up our order the time before this one. Really poor business

text: The food isn't bad, but they took a long time to answer the phone, and a long time to notice that customers were waiting for their pizza, also they almost didn't honor my (unexpired) coupon.

name: James Landon
text:
Would give it 0 stars but won't let me.

text: Several times I have ordered from the place, I order extra cheese, give me lots of sauce instead. I live three miles from this location and it's too easy for their drivers to not figure out how to punch in my address in there phones or even â€¦More

text: Worst experience ever!!! Very rude couldnt even find my address and was very distasteful and disrespectful. Worst experience EVER.

text: This is the best pizza hut in southern utah dont even waste your time with the other locations they maybe all under the same owner but this one has the best staff my pizza is always hot and. Ready when i pick it up or get dilevary i dont â€¦More

text: I have literally  been waiting for 60 minutes for my pizza and they didn't bother calling me to let me know that they got 6 orders at the same time as mine and they were "slammed" if I would've known I would have order Papa Johns!!! When I â€¦More

text: This is my first time ordering from this pizzahut since I live in a different town. I always get the same thing every time and haven't had an issue before. A bbq sauce (extra sauce) pizza with bacon and chicken and onions and I special â€¦More

name: Chelle Nixon
text: Disappointing lately!  More often than not, my orders have been wrong. I will order cheese breadsticks and they say "it's difficult to see CHEESE on the orders", last week wend ordered our usual and it was soupy... today they put white sauce on and the order clearly said classic marinara sauce... how can they mess up so often?

name: 27bmv
text: I loved Pizza Hut, then I started ordering from this one and 3 out of the 5 times my order was wrong or they were out of something  just never very good.

text: We love the customer service at this pizza hut. We've made it our go to pizza delivery because of it.

text: Pizza was awful, bread sticks burnt, pizza delivery guy was 30 min late. I thought I'd try a different Pizza Hut hoping it would be different, but it was just as disappointing as the other location on Bluff street.
